ctname = #{ctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cttype = #{cttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctnexttype = #{ctnexttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update KQDS_BLCT set ctname = #{ctname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cttype = #{cttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctnexttype = #{ctnexttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, useflag = #{useflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderno = #{orderno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from
p where 1=1
and p.${key} = #{item}
ORDER BY p.orderno asc
